title: ISlicingData.Offset
description: Gets or sets the linear or radial spacing between slicing planes.
returns: Linear spacing (meters) or radial spacing (radians) between slicing planes (see Remarks )
remarks:
If
ISlicingData::PlaneReferences
specifies:
a planar entity, then this property specifies linear spacing between slices.
a linear entity and a point entity, then this property specifies radial spacing between slices.
